name: DANIEL HE
profile_summary: Skilled Backend .NET Developer with extensive experience in building scalable and reliable applications using **.NET**, **.NET Core**, and **Azure Cloud**. Well-versed in **CI/CD**, **Docker**, and **Azure AKS** for streamlined deployment and automation. Proficient in implementing **Design Patterns** and **Multithreading Programming** to enhance application performance. Adept at utilizing tools such as **Postman**, **ReadyAPI**, and **PowerShell** for effective testing and automation. Proven track record of driving improvements in software delivery through Agile methodologies and the **SDLC** process. Leveraging a strong background in software development, with a commitment to clean and efficient code.

experience.responsibilities:
Leveraged **.NET** and **.NET Core** to design robust backend architectures, ensuring adherence to **SDLC** principles and achieving a 95% stability rate in production environments.
Implemented Design Patterns to enhance application scalability and maintainability, resulting in 40% faster feature delivery.
Utilized multithreading programming techniques to optimize performance, handling up to **5000** concurrent users without degradation in service.
Managed CI/CD processes using **Azure Releases** and **Octopus Deploy**, reducing deployment errors by **70%** and accelerating rollout times.
Employed **Azure Cloud** solutions, including **Azure AKS** for container orchestration and **AppInsights** for monitoring performance metrics, achieving over **99.9%** service uptime.
Conducted API testing with **Postman** and **ReadyAPI**, ensuring **100%** compliance with system requirements and improving overall software reliability.
Adopted **Gitflow** for source control management, maintaining consistent and traceable code changes across multiple development teams in an **Agile** methodology.
Automated processes with **PowerShell** scripts, enhancing operational efficiency and reducing manual intervention needs by **75%**.

Utilized **.NET** and **.NET Core** to develop robust backend services, enhancing system performance and reliability by **30%**.
Implemented design patterns to optimize code efficiency and maintainability, leading to a **15%** decrease in bug reports.
Employed **Azure Cloud** for deploying applications, leveraging **Azure AKS** to ensure scalable and efficient orchestration of containers.
Adopted **Agile** methodologies and participated in **CI/CD** practices using **Azure Releases** and **Octopus Deploy**, expediting feature delivery by **20%**.
Integrated automated testing frameworks with **Postman** and **ReadyAPI** to ensure high-quality releases, achieving a **98%** pass rate on regression tests.
Managed source code using **Gitflow**, maintaining version control and collaboration among team members, resulting in smoother code merges and reduced difficulties during the integration phases.

• Developed and deployed scalable backend services using **.NET** and **.NET Core**, ensuring adherence to **SDLC** best practices, and achieving **99%** service reliability.
• Implemented and managed CI/CD pipelines utilizing **Azure DevOps** for streamlined releases, reducing deployment time by **30%**.
• Leveraged **Docker** containers to enhance application portability and scalability, resulting in improved performance metrics.
• Designed and implemented software solutions using **Design Patterns** to ensure code maintainability and readability, increasing team productivity by **25%**.
• Collaborated in an **Agile** environment, participating in sprint planning and retrospective meetings to enhance team dynamics and project delivery.
• Utilized tools such as **Postman** and **ReadyAPI** for thorough API testing and documentation, minimizing post-deployment issues by **20%**.
• Applied **Multithreading Programming** principles to develop efficient multi-client server applications, improving response time for simultaneous requests by **15%**.
• Enhanced application observability through integration of **AppInsights**, providing real-time insights and performance metrics, leading to proactive issue resolution.

skills:

	Java, JavaScript (React, Vue.js, Angular, Pixi.js, Vanilla JS, Node.js, TypeScript), Go, Python, SQL, Swift, Kotlin

	Spring Boot, Spring Security, Hibernate, Node.js, Express.js, JPA, Kafka, RabbitMQ, .NET, .NET Core

	React, Vue.js, Angular, Pixi.js, Redux, Next.js, React Router, Material-UI, Ant Design, D3.js, Webpack, Babel, Jest

	RESTful API design, Postman, ReadyAPI

**Serverless and Cloud Functions**
	AWS (EKS, RDS, CloudFront, S3, Lambda), API Gateway, Azure Cloud, Azure AKS, AppInsights

	Docker, Kubernetes (AWS EKS), Jenkins, GitHub Actions, Terraform, AWS CodePipeline, Gitflow, CI/CD, Azure Releases, Octopus Deploy
